statement.p: Given the function \displaystyle{y}={3}{\sin{{\left({7}{t}-\frac{\pi}{{6}}\right)}}}-{8} , determine the amplitude, phase shift, and period.
Give exact answers as fractions and/or multiples of \displaystyle\pi as necessary.

solution.p: The function \displaystyle{A}{\sin{{\left({B}{\left({t}-{C}\right)}\right)}}}+{D} will have amplitude \displaystyle{\left|{A}\right|}, phase shift \displaystyle{C}, and period \displaystyle\frac{{{2}\pi}}{{\left|{B}\right|}}.
So the amplitude is \displaystyle{\left|{3}\right|}={3}, the phase shift is \displaystyle\frac{\pi}{{42}}, and the period is \displaystyle\frac{{{2}\pi}}{{7}}.
